meta.objective: Execute final remaining P1 (Rhythm Caching) and P2 tasks (Parallelism, Metrics).

phases.name: Rhythm Engine Caching (Priority P1)
phases.description: Prevent Rhythm engine from re-calculating analysis for the same text (New P1 identified in 2025 audit).

tasks.issue: Rhythm analysis is computationally expensive and repeated.
tasks.action: Implement hash-based caching in `LyricMeter.analyze(text)`. Use `self._cache` keyed by `md5(text)` to store and retrieve `RhythmAnalysis` results.

phases.name: Parallel Engine Execution (Priority P2)
phases.description: Run independent engines concurrently to reduce latency.

tasks.action: Refactor start of `analyze`: Use `concurrent.futures.ThreadPoolExecutor` to run `emotion.analyze`, `tone.detect_key`, and `integrity.scan` in parallel.
Measure execution time of `analyze` and record it in diagnostics.
